title: What are examples of good and bad attitude? - Quora

response.answer_text: Things happen, it all burns down to us, whether we see the bad or good in a situation, that's attitude. If you're able to see a good thing even in a bad situation which will drown you in complete sadness , that's a really good attitude. For example, you and your girlfriend are going in  a bike for a theatre to see an awseome movie in a pleasant cool evening, the tyre got punctured , you can either feel grumpy, sad and get angry because you missed the film orYou can enjoy a pleasant romantic walk in the cool evening with your girlfriend , it's all what you choose to be.

When you feel you are over weight, then you are left with two choices to choose one.  Not compromising with present state and planning for maintaining a healthy body by exercising/dieting/walking. 2. Sitting simply and compromising with self that this is your destiny and doing nothing.  If you choose 1st option, yours is good attitude. If 2nd, it is bad attitude.
